name: Thief! (Six Strings)
description:
Thief!

You are a thief in a hurry! No time to slow down, run through the rooms and steal the money, before time runs out.

You can't jump, but there is a way to turn everything upside-down...

Instructions:

  • Press space or tap the screen to rotate the level (clockwise).
  • Falling down is faster then walking.
  • You have 45 seconds to complete the level.
  • There are 5 levels in the game.

Made for the very first microStudio game  jam in 2 days.
